name: Emergency Medicine Services of Tx PLLC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Emergency Medicine Services of Tx PLLC is a Emergency Medicine provider based in San Antonio, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $15.0M in Medicaid payments across 363K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $15.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
